thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com
thread.title: Janet Cawte
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Janet Cawte

author: Janet Cawte
title: Janet Cawte
text: From the ordering to the receipt of the sunglasses, I could not have asked for better or quicker service. Otticanet was prompt to respond to concerns (when I had ordered without receiving paypal discount) and assisted the process of cancelling the order and re-ordering correctly. Would not buy sunglasses anywhere else.
